mainMsg:
Welcome to my website!
It is in constant development and I'm always looking for improvements.
subMsg: For now, there are just a few things to check: some videos, an about page and you can visit my social media in the footer of the website.
hDescription: A list of YouTube videos to watch here or on my Official Artist Channel.
streamingDesc:
Listen to my music on your favorite platform.
Follow me to get notified of new releases.
aboutMsg:
Hello! My name is Ian and I'm an independent artist. I create music, videos, and digital art.
This website is a personal project to share my work with you.
If you like what you see, please consider supporting my work.
aboutSubMsg: You can find me on social media and streaming platforms. Feel free to reach out and say hi!
tosDesc:
Welcome to IamSHIUBA! These Terms of Service govern your use of this website.
By accessing it, you agree to the terms outlined below.
tosAUdesc:
You agree to use the site solely for lawful purposes and in compliance with these Terms. The following is prohibited:
Attempting to gain unauthorized access to the site or disrupting its functionality. Using the site to distribute illegal, offensive, or copyright-infringing content.
tosCOdesc: All content provided on this site, except for embedded videos from external platforms, is owned by IamSHIUBA. You may not copy, reproduce, or distribute any content without permission.
tosELdesc: Our site contains links to external platforms (e.g., YouTube, SoundCloud). We are not responsible for the content or practices of these platforms.
tosLoLdesc: This site is provided 'as is.' We do not guarantee uninterrupted availability or freedom from errors. We are not liable for any damages resulting from the use of this site.
tosCttTdesc: We may revise these Terms of Service at any time. Changes will be posted on this page. It is your responsibility to review the Terms periodically.
tosCONTACTdesc: If you have questions, please contact us at: t.me/contactishiubagithub.
ppDesc: At IamSHIUBA, we respect your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle visitor information.
ppDCdesc: This site does not collect or store personal data from visitors. The only data accessed is related to the functionality of embedded videos and theme or language selectors.
ppCOOKIEdesc: We do not use cookies or any tracking technologies directly. However, embedded videos from external platforms (such as YouTube) may use cookies. We recommend reviewing the privacy policies of these platforms to understand their practices.
ppDSdesc: We do not collect or share any visitor information. We are committed to providing a secure environment for our visitors.
ppCttPdesc: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page.
ppCONTACTdesc: If you have questions about this Policy, please contact us at: t.me/contactishiubagithub.
updatesDescription: Check out our latest updates and improvements
admin_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this update?
